name: ILP#2-RayLocker
description:
------------------------------ Welcome to RayLock ------------------------------------

Your goal is to hit blocks as they run by with the arc of there color.

The arcs  _COLOR_  is dictated by positions of the locker  _RELITIVE_  to each other.

Using LEFT click you can change the position of locker1.

Use RIGHT click to change position of locker2.

-- to help speed this up cause its late --|

No second scene                                             5% penalty for each missing component.

No Git repository                                           15% penalty

No comments                                                  10% penalty

                                                                                    |

the project feels like a low D/-D- ~50%

with penalty's (30%) that drops to 20%

8.75 final grade comes to 1.75% final grade.

looking at it now I put in weeks of work for 

nothing. On top of that I helped Mario 

complete his entire assiment from scratch 

while still on vacation, he should of been

helping me. But that's life.
